韉字的基本解释

韉
jiān
见“鞯”。

韉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiān］
［《廣韻》則前切，平先，精。］
亦作“帴2”。亦作“1”。亦作“韀1”。“鞯1”的繁体字。
(1)马鞍下的垫子。
(2)指马鞍。
(3)借指马。

韉字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【革字部】　韉； 康熙笔画：26； 页码：页1392第40
【唐韻】【正韻】?則前切，音箋。【說文】馬鞁具也。【玉篇】鞍韉也。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiān］
["Guangyun" cuts forward, flat first, and refined. ]
Also known as "帴2". Also called "1". Also known as "韀1". "鞯1" in traditional characters.
(1) The cushion under the saddle.
(2) Refers to the saddle.
(3) By referring to the horse.
saddle blanket
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【The Department of Leather Characters】　鞯; Kangxi Strokes: 26; Page Number: Page 1392 No. 40
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Then cut forward, phonetic note. [Said the text] Ma Yanju also. [Jade articles] Saddle Yan also.
